General.Name: Beijing Bayi Space LCD Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Beijing Bayi Space LCD Technology Co., Ltd. researches, develops, produces, and sells liquid crystal materials for displays (LCD), organic electroluminescent materials for displays (OLED), polymer dispersed liquid crystal (PDLC) smart films, and other liquid crystal materials in China. The company's products include monolithic liquid crystal material, such as ester, alkyne, vinyl, negative, fluorinated, chiral, acrylic, bicyclohexane, biphenyl, difluoromethoxy, and phenylcyclohexane liquid crystals; hybrid liquid crystals; OLED materials; and intermediate materials. Its products are used in various applications, including mobile phones, laptops, computer monitors, and televisions. The company is also involved in the exporting activities. Beijing Bayi Space LCD Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.
